Package image

Class ImageOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • image.ImageOperation

extends java.lang.Object
    Some image operations. Including various Java's Graphics2D derived operations.

        public void setInterpolation​(java.lang.Object interpolationType)
        Sets the interpolation when the image is rendered using Java's Graphics2D
        Parameters:
        interpolationType - - the types can be Image.BICUBIC, Image.BILINEAR or Image.NEAREST_NEIGHBOR
